cast.overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins due to the efforts of the Mad Titan, Thanos. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos' actions and restore order to the universe once and for all, no matter what consequences may be in store.
cast.title: Avengers: Endgame

details.biography: American actor who has appeared in Legendary Dudas and Henry Danger. He went on to nab the lead role in Brightburn. He also had a recurring role in three episodes of Shameless in 2015 and he played 12-year-old Scott Lang in the 2019 blockbuster Avengers: Endgame.
details.name: Jackson A. Dunn
